cab.content: THIS DpCUIaENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY rS GOVERNivlEHT.SECRET.CP.23 (29).COPY NO.9 v cabinet.THE IRON AND STEEL INDUSTRY.PROPOSED ENQUIRY BY A ROYAL COiiiilSSION OR OTHER BODY.Proposed reply to the letter from the General Secretary of the Iron and Steel Trades Confederation to the Prime Minister.Memorandum by the President of the Board of Trade.Two of ,iivy colleagues have suggested to me that the draft of the letter does not make it sufficiently clear that no duty will be imposed in the present Parliament. I therefore suggest that on p.3 In the second paragraph^, after the words "lifetime of the present Parliament", there should be added the words "and there can, therefore, be no question of imposing a duty in the present Parliament".P.C-L.Board of Trade,2nd February, 192 9.
